def_cn: 品脱（液量单位，英制中等于0.568升或1/8英国加仑，美制中等于0.473升或1/8美国加仑）
def_en: A pint is a unit of measurement for liquids. In Britain, it is equal to 568 cubic centimetres or one eighth of an imperial gallon. In America, it is equal to 473 cubic centimetres or one eighth of an American gallon.
If you go for a pint, you go to the pub to drink a pint of beer or more.
